dialogue.htmlContent: Lilaya lets out a desperate wail as she realises that your condom's just broken at the critical moment. With your [pc.cum] dripping out of her [lilaya.pussy+], she lets out a distressed cry and pushes you away from her. [npc.speechNoEffects(What the fuck?! What kind of cheap, shitty condoms are you buying?! Fuck!)]

Lilaya lets out a delighted moan as she realises that your condom has prevented any of your cum from entering her pussy. Biting her lip, she lets out a happy little cry, [npc.speechNoEffects(~Mmm!~ Your cock throbbing inside of me like that feels so good!)]

Lilaya suddenly realises what you've just done, and as she feels your [pc.cum] dripping out of her [lilaya.pussy+], she lets out an angry cry and violently shoves you away from her. [npc.speechNoEffects(What the fuck?! I told you to pull out! Fuck!)]

Lilaya suddenly realises what you've just done, and as she feels an intense warmth spreading up through her [lilaya.pussy+], she lets out an angry cry and violently shoves you away from her. [npc.speechNoEffects(What the fuck?! I told you to pull back before orgasming! Fuck!)]
